subject: Pedals control box Issues
description_text:
Hello,

I purchased your pedals in January 2024 on your Aliexpress store (Order
number  8183062824317469), and have been enjoying them a lot so far. Sadly,
since a few months, I've been getting weird Issues with them, ranging from
weird and inaccurate inputs (basically the pedals uncalibrating themselves
mid-use), and even disconnects. I've tried several USB 3.0 Ports, and with
all of my other USB Peripherals unplugged, as well as with and without the
grounding cable on the control box, but the issues keep reappearing. I hope
that you might be able to help me with these Issues.

Sincerely

M. Voss

conversations.body_text: Hi Marcel Voß,  Additionally, the video you uploaded is incomplete and cannot be opened properly. Please consider using Google Drive to upload the video and share the link with us.
I did not add any Video to my Email? if needed, I can make a video of the calibration Issue in the next days.
Hi Marcel Voß,    Your video needs to be fully uploaded before sending the email. It seems the email was sent before the upload was complete, which is why I’m unable to open the video.
